BalanceExpireDisclaimerNeverExpire: Great travel memories never expire, and now, miles don’t either. We’re excited to share that there’s no expiration date on the miles you’ve earned with us.
ChaseNoMileageExpirationMessage: Great travel memories never expire, and now, miles don’t either. We’re excited to share that there’s no expiration date on the miles you’ve earned with us.
MyAccountForceUpdateMessage: A newer version of the United Airlines app is available. Please update to the new version to continue.
BalanceExpireDisclaimer: Great travel memories never expire, and now, miles don’t either. We’re excited to share that there’s no expiration date on the miles you’ve earned with us.
UnableToInsertCreditCardToProfileErrorMe: Unable to insert credit card details.
TSAAccountMessage: There are inconsistencies with your traveler information. To comply with the TSA Secure Flight program and ensure that you receive correct mileage and other MileagePlus® benefits, visit united.com to correct the traveler information in your MileagePlus profile.
promotionNotFoundMessage: Unable to get the promotion due to jsonResponse has no Promotions
VBQModelDescription: We’re making big changes to the MileagePlus® program to do what’s right and fair for our members in these unprecedented times. This includes extending 2020 Premier® status (up to Premier 1K®), reducing requirements to help you reach a higher tier, removing some redeposit fees, and more. We’ll update your account details in the next few weeks.
TCDAdvisoryMessages1: PhoneEmail~Providing a traveler’s mobile number and/or email address indicates that he or she consents to receive SMS and/or email messages via the contact information provided concerning flight status updates or notifications, and as otherwise permitted by our privacy policy. Standard messaging and data rates may apply. Messaging frequency varies based on customer preferences and the status of flight operations.~false
TCDAdvisoryMessages2: PurchaseTnC~Purchase of this ticket means you understand and agree to all fare rules associated with this ticket, all terms and conditions associated with any additional offer/product purchases made, United’s dangerous goods policy, and the terms and conditions in United’s Contract of Carriage.~false
TCDAdvisoryMessages3: TCDmessage~View text messaging terms and conditions. U.S. supported carriers are AT&T, U.S. Cellular®, Verizon Wireless, Sprint, Cricket, Boost, Virgin Mobile USA , T-Mobile® and MetroPCS. Canadian supported carriers are Aliant Mobility, Bell Mobility, Eastlink, Fido, Mobilicity, MTS, NorthernTel Mobility, Public Mobile, Rogers Wireless, SaskTel Mobility, Télébec Mobilité, TELUS Mobility, Vidéotron, Virgin Mobile Canada, WIND Mobile. The wireless carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. U.S. and Canadian customers may opt out at any time by texting STOP to 26266 from their mobile device. For more information, text HELP to 26266 or call 1-800-UNITED-1 (1-800-864-8331).~false
TCDAdvisoryMessagesForELF: Purchase of this ticket means you understand and agree to all fare rules associated with this nonrefundable and non-changeable Basic Economy ticket, United's dangerous goods policy, and the terms and conditions in United's Contract of Carriage, and the collection, processing and transfer of your information to the United States for handling in accordance with our privacy policy.
TCDAdvisoryMessagesForIBELite: Purchase of this ticket means you understand and agree to all fare rules associated with this nonrefundable and non-changeable Basic Economy ticket, United's dangerous goods policy, and the terms and conditions in United's Contract of Carriage, and the collection, processing and transfer of your information to the United States for handling in accordance with our privacy policy. Basic Economy tickets issued by December 31, 2021, for travel commencing by December 31, 2021, can be changed.
InhibitMessage: Flights must be booked no less than 60 minutes before the scheduled flight departure. Please complete your purchase soon to confirm your booking.

TPIinfo_ConfirmationPage_BilledSeperateT: (Billed separately By Travel Guard Group Inc.)
TPIPurchaseResposne-ConfirmationResponse: A confirmation email has been sent to

You have elected to purchase Travel Guard's trip insurance. Plan benefits, along with applicable definitions and terms of coverage, are fully described in your Policy of Insurance. It is your responsibility to read and understand the details of your coverage.
You can reach Travel Guard at 1.877.934.8308 to inquire about the product or file a claim.

UnaccompaniedDisclaimerMessage: Children under the age of 5 cannot travel unless they're accompanied by a parent, legal guardian or someone who is atleast 18 years old. Children ages 5-17 who are traveling unaccompanied must use our unaccompanied service, which can not be booked with the United app. Please go to united.com to book.

DuplicateTravelerMessage: You have entered two travelers with the same name. Please adjust the Title, First Name, Last Name, Middle Initial, and/ or Suffix of one or both names. The name entered must match your government-issued photo ID.
